bossDialog: (As you begin to notice that the room is unusually dark, the shadows in the room all begin to converge on a single point. You ready your creatures for a fight.)
(Mocking, creepy laughter echoes around the room, creating a cacophonous ambience as a being of living darkness manifests before you, ready to attack!)
(One of your creatures suddenly shoves into you, barging you aside! As you turn to admonish it, you notice it grappling with a creature that had been posing as your shadow to ambush you!)

master.dialog: Your creatures will be shaking in their shoes when they see my Shadows in action! And if they don't have shoes, well, they'll just be really scared.
master.name: Roland

name: Shadow
